> <OLD>
> Talon paled and answer by her com link "where do you want to meet us sir?"
>
> Elita fell in silence while she quietly sobbed


> Straight Shot nods in reply.  She had tried hard to not make the situation
> appear too severe.  Yet she didn't quite appreciate the fact that Leo
> Prime's voice sounded a bit ominous.  She goes to Leo but with a bit of a
> serious expression on her face.
>
> " Leo, please, I think Elita might've picked up on your tone of voice.  We
> know how serious the situation is but try explaining that to a little girl
> who misses her parents so much that it breaks her heart just at the
> mention of something as horrible as this."
>
> She looks up to him with a look of desperation.
>
> " Please, try not ta send any negative statements if she's around?"


> Elita: Elita hugged Talon


<NEW>

LEO PRIME looked over at ELITA and then at TALON and STRIGHTSHOT,
clearly not the most comfortable around one so young. He looked to be
every inch a soldier and commander, but he seemed to be put off
balance by ELITA's youth.

"Fine." he said as he nodded at STRIGHTSHOT and TALON. "Then I will
need you two to step out here in the hall with me." It is obvious that
he was making an effort to calm his voice, but there was still some
bits of that edge left.

He turned and stepped further away so that their conversation would
not be over heard by ELITA once the door was closed.

(TAG)

Preston
